featured.text: About 1 in 5 persons suffers fever, headaches, and body aches, usually lasting a week or so.
Moreover, the effect is often 20 space motion sickness, headaches, and nausea.
The Chinese and Indians 16 it for at least 4,000 years to treat everything from headache to depression.

definition.zh_def: 頭痛，一種常見的疼痛，通常發生在頭部或頸部。
definition.en_def: A headache is a common pain that occurs in the head or neck area.
definition.example: I couldn't concentrate on my work because I had a terrible headache.
